/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of looking up towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun casts a bright light, illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a vibrant urban landscape. Cars are parked along the side of the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The colors in the image are vivid, with the blue sky contrasting beautifully with the greenery and the various hues of the buildings and cars. The image provides a glimpse into the daily life in Beijing, showcasing the city's architectural charm and the lively atmosphere of its streets.
